sentence.Network_en: Opposition leaders this week implored the president to break the deadlock.
sentence.Network_cn: 反对党领袖本周恳求总统打破僵局。

sentence.Network_en: European agriculture ministers failed to break the deadlock over farm subsidies.
sentence.Network_cn: 欧洲各国农业部长在农业补贴问题上未能打破僵局。

sentence.Network_en: The negotiations reached a deadlock after two hours.
sentence.Network_cn: 两小时后,谈判陷入了僵局.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 死锁（deadlock）指进程之间互相永久阻塞的状态，SQL可以检测到死锁，并选择终止其中一个事务以干预死锁状态。两个进程发生 …
译网情深 - 打印文章 - ... date of agreement 协议签署日 deadlock 僵局 deduction 扣减.
控制发生死结   (Deadlock)   情形时，工作阶段的回应方式。当两个处理序   (Process)   都锁定资料，并且两个处理序都无法在另一个处.

encyclopedia.content: 所谓死锁: 是指两个或两个以上的进程在执行过程中,因争夺资源而造成的一种互相等待的现象,若无外力作用,它们都将无法推进下去.此时称系统处于死锁状态或系统产生了死锁,这些永远在互相等竺的进程称为死锁进程.

entry.def: If a dispute or series of negotiations reaches deadlock, neither side is willing to give in at all and no agreement can be made.

example.ex: They called for a compromise on all sides to break the deadlock in the world trade talks...
example.tran: 他们呼吁各方作出让步以打破世界贸易谈判中的僵局。

example.ex: Peace talks between the two sides ended in deadlock last month.
example.tran: 双方上个月的和平谈判陷入了僵局。

means.word_mean: 1. a situation in which no progress can be made or no advancement is possible;

auth_sentence.content: UN efforts have failed to break the political deadlock.
auth_sentence.res_content: UN efforts have failed to break the political deadlock.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: UN efforts have failed to break the political deadlock.

auth_sentence.content: Fleming says the political deadlock is causing widespread fear.
auth_sentence.res_content: Fleming says the political deadlock is causing widespread fear.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Fleming says the political deadlock is causing widespread fear.

auth_sentence.content: But his personal appeal did not immediately break a deadlock.
auth_sentence.res_content: But his personal appeal did not immediately break a deadlock.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But his personal appeal did not immediately break a deadlock.

sentences.en: The negotiations reached a deadlock after two hours.
sentences.cn: 两小时后, 谈判陷入了僵局。

jushi.english: Somebody will have to compromise if we are to break the deadlock between the two warring factions.
jushi.chinese: 如果我们要打破交战两派的僵局，总有一方必须妥协的。

jushi.english: Deadlock over wage levels has prevented an agreement being reached.
jushi.chinese: 在工资水平问题上的僵局阻碍了协议的达成。

jushi.english: The deadlock between the two countries continued for as long as ten years.
jushi.chinese: 这两国之间的僵局持续十年之久。
